ComicInfo.Penciller: Dean Zachary,Roger Robinson,Brian O'Connell,Kris Renkewitz,Brock Hor Jr.,Dean Zachary,Brian O'Connell,Kris Renkewitz,Brock Hor Jr.
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Firm Hand: Ultratech stocks start to fall after the disappearance of Stanley Leland. Jimmy and Bob are confused when they see another Prototype fighting Blind Faith and Warstrike. Jimmy helps Warstrike take the other Prototype out and they discover it's a robot. JD Hunt plots a hostile takeover.
Days of Summer Glory: Ironclad stops a bank robbery and isn't certain how to handle the popularity. After he tells his parents of his alter ego, they tell him that they are proud of him. Ironclad leaves to help stop a hospital fire.
Design for Living: Ladykiller allies herself with Cass Cassidy to save his daughter from JD Hunt.
The Eye Has It: Leann Butler, a comatose girl who had been brought in to Ultratech by Prototoype after ingesting nanotech, wakes up mutated and confused. After a brief battle with Prototype and the Ultratech security forces, Leann pretends to return to her former state.
Candid Pixx: Pixx briefly meets the other students of the Academy of the New Elite. After Feline mocks her, Pixx uses her illusion powers to put her in her place.
ComicInfo.Title: A Firm Hand; Days of Summer Glory; Design for Living; The Eye Has It; Candid Pixx
ComicInfo.Writer: Len Strazewski,Mark Paniccia,Kurt Busiek,Tom Mason,Gerard Jones,Len Strazewski,Mark Paniccia,Kurt Busiek,Tom Mason,Gerard Jones
